which proceedings are active in United Kingdom courts shall not be referred to in any motion debate or question see pp 441-443 though the House has further resolved to give Chair some discretion to allow reference to be made to matters awaiting or under jurisdiction in all civil courts in certain specified circumstances provided that there is no real and substantial danger of prejudice to the proceedings The rule it is called also applied to matters before coroner s court or Fatal Accident Inquiry If the subject-matter of the question is found to be or become of the questions has been given the Member is asked to withdraw it or the may direct it to be removed from the notice paper or refuse to allow it to be asked if it is on the Order Paper The rule does not apply to matters which are in courts of law outside Great Britain and Northern Island nor to matters which are the subject of administrative inquiry segala hormatnya jelas berasaskan alasan bertentangan praktis diamalkan sedemikian dikaji Seterusnya kembali petikan buku Erskine May jelas sekiranya prosiding memutuskan dihalang menilaikan wujud real and substantial danger of prejudice prosiding segala hormatnya memohon rujuk 231g jelas diputuskan 231g question shall not be so drafted to be likely to prejudice case under trial or be asked to any matter which is Reference shall not be made to any matter which sivil in rem Keadilan Amerika penolakan seseorang dikecualikan menjawab alasan judis dibincangkan Buku Erskine May s Treaties on The Law Privileges Proceeding s and Usage of Parliament 24th Edition dimukasurat disebut berikut By resolution of the House cases in which proceedings are active in United Kingdom courts shall not be referred to in any motion debate or question see pp 441-443 though the House has further resolved to give Chair some discretion to allow reference to be made to matters awaiting or under jurisdiction in all civil courts in certain specified circumstances provided that there is no real and substantial danger of prejudice to the proceedings The rule it is called also applied to matters before coroner s court or Fatal Accident Inquiry If the subject-matter of the question is found to be or become of the questions has been given the Member is asked to withdraw it or the may direct it to be removed from the notice paper or refuse to allow it to be asked if it is on the Order Paper The rule does not apply to matters which are in courts of law outside Great Britain and Northern Island nor to matters which are the subject of administrative inquiry segala hormatnya jelas berasaskan alasan bertentangan praktis diamalkan sedemikian dikaji Seterusnya kembali petikan buku Erskine May jelas sekiranya prosiding memutuskan dihalang menilaikan wujud real and substantial danger of prejudice prosiding segala hormatnya menimbang seterusnya berpendapat Ahli-ahli didengar berkenaannya menyakinkan diri rujukan penuh prosiding seterusnya menimbangkan kesan soalan- ditanya prosiding hal memohon menjelaskan salinan menimbangkan mendalam kertas-kertas prosiding DOJ tuntutan jawapan-jawapan kepadanya sekiranya menyakinkan diri fakta-fakta isu-isu berbangkit soalan-soalan dihalang seterusnya segala hormatnya memohon rujuk 231g jelas diputuskan 231g question shall not be so drafted to be likely to prejudice case under trial or be asked to any matter which is Reference shall not be made to any matter which is in such way might in the opinion of chair prejudice the interests of parties thereto segala hormatnya menentusahkan parties prejudis timbul disebut berikut By resolution of the House cases in which proceedings are active in United Kingdom courts shall not be referred to in any motion debate or question see pp 441-443 though the House has further resolved to give Chair some discretion to allow reference to be made to matters awaiting or under jurisdiction in all civil courts in certain specified circumstances provided that there is no real and substantial danger of prejudice to the proceedings The rule it is called also applied to matters before coroner s court or Fatal Accident Inquiry If the subject-matter of the question is found to be or become of the questions has been given the Member is asked to withdraw it or the may direct it to be removed from the notice paper or refuse to allow it to be asked if it is on the Order Paper The rule does not apply to matters which are in courts of law outside Great Britain and Northern Island nor to matters which are the subject of administrative inquiry segala hormatnya Keadilan Amerika penolakan seseorang dikecualikan menjawab alasan judis dibincangkan Buku Erskine May s Treaties on The Law Privileges Proceeding s and Usage of Parliament 24th Edition dimukasurat disebut berikut By resolution of the House cases in which proceedings are active in United Kingdom courts shall not be referred to in any motion debate or question see pp 441-443 though the House has further resolved to give Chair some discretion to allow reference to be made to matters awaiting or under jurisdiction in all civil courts in certain specified circumstances provided that there is no real and substantial danger of prejudice to the proceedings The rule it is called also applied to matters before coroner s court or Fatal Accident Inquiry If the subject-matter of the question is found to be or become of the questions has been given the Member is asked to withdraw it or the may direct it to be removed from the notice paper or refuse to allow it to be asked if it is on the Order Paper The rule does not apply to matters which are in courts of law outside Great Britain and Northern Island nor to matters which are the subject of administrative inquiry segala hormatnya jelas berasaskan alasan bertentangan praktis diamalkan sedemikian dikaji Seterusnya kembali petikan buku Erskine May jelas sekiranya prosiding memutuskan dihalang menilaikan wujud real and substantial danger of prejudice prosiding segala hormatnya menimbang seterusnya berpendapat Ahli-ahli didengar berkenaannya menyakinkan diri rujukan penuh prosiding seterusnya menimbangkan kesan soalan-soalan ditanya prosiding hal memohon menjelaskan salinan menimbangkan mendalam kertas-kertas prosiding DOJ tuntutan jawapan-jawapan kepadanya sekiranya menyakinkan diri fakta-fakta isu-isu berbangkit soalan-soalan dihalang

seterusnya segala hormatnya memohon rujuk 231g jelas diputuskan 231g question shall not be so drafted to be likely to prejudice case under trial or be asked to any matter which is Reference shall not be made to any matter which is in such way might in the opinion of chair prejudice the interests of parties thereto segala hormatnya menentusahkan parties prejudis timbul seakibat diajukan dilanda krisis wujudnya melibatkan topik perbincangan hangat telahpun menyebabkan tegas negara-negara Singapura United Kingdom Amerika berkesan mana-mana telahpun menyebabkan ditanya khususnya corak pentadbiran pengendalian siasatan jabatan-jabatan Peguam PDRM SPRM semestinya berkepentingan dibahaskan segala hormatnya kesan penghalang dibahaskan transparen memprejudiskan kesemua kehilangan menyoal menjelaskan keraguan timbul pengetahuan keseluruhannya merayu precedent dicapai sesiapa menghalang sesuatu dibangkitkan memfailkan prosiding tujuan niat matlamat dicapai digubal enhance bukannya restrict perbahasan perkara-perkara selaku merayu dibenarkan dibahas dikaji diketepikan merta PERATURAN MESYUARAT BAHARU

dibincangkan Buku Erskine May s Treaties on The Law Privileges Proceeding s and Usage of Parliament 24th Edition dimukasurat disebut berikut By resolution of the House cases in which proceedings are active in United Kingdom courts shall not be referred to in any motion debate or question see pp 441-443 though the House has further resolved to give Chair some discretion to allow reference to be made to matters awaiting or under jurisdiction in all civil courts in certain specified circumstances provided that there is no real and substantial danger of prejudice to the proceedings The rule it is called also applied to matters before coroner s court or Fatal Accident Inquiry If the subject-matter of the question is found to be or become of the questions has been given the Member is asked to withdraw it or the may direct it to be removed from the notice paper or refuse to allow it to be asked if it is on the Order Paper The rule does not apply to matters which are in courts of law outside Great Britain and Northern Island nor to matters which are the subject of administrative inquiry segala hormatnya jelas berasaskan alasan bertentangan praktis diamalkan sedemikian dikaji Seterusnya kembali petikan buku Erskine May jelas sekiranya prosiding memutuskan dihalang menilaikan wujud real and substantial danger of prejudice prosiding segala hormatnya menimbang seterusnya berpendapat Ahli-ahli didengar berkenaannya menyakinkan diri rujukan penuh prosiding seterusnya menimbangkan kesan soalan-soalan ditanya prosiding hal memohon menjelaskan salinan menimbangkan mendalam diputuskan 231g question shall not be so drafted to be likely to prejudice case under trial or be asked to any matter which is Reference shall not be made to any matter which is in such way might in the opinion of chair prejudice the interests of parties thereto segala hormatnya menentusahkan parties prejudis timbul seakibat diajukan dilanda krisis wujudnya melibatkan topik perbincangan hangat diri aktivis Sabah-Sarawak keluar ringkasnya SSKM hal implikasi perpaduan memandang serius kesan ketenteraman keseluruhannya semata-mata menghalang menyuarakan rungutan menyelesaikan ditimbulkan malah merumitkan simpati lainnya dianggap perihatin kuku besi menangani ketetapan merangka gerak menangani Holistik termasuklah menjemput mendengar rungutan menggelarkan diri SSKM rungutan-rungutan dikalangan akhir-akhir perpaduan keharmonian kesejahteraan terdiri berbilang kaum agama terhakis menyebabkan golongan tertentu memainkan bangsa agama sewenang-wenangnya merasakan tegas menangani Perhimpunan Bersih Perhimpunan Bersatu baru-baru menanamkan bibit kebencian syak wasangka kaum Rukun tonggak perpaduan keharmonian kesejahteraan langsung dihormati dipatuhi hal memandang serius kesan ketenteraman keseluruhannya menangani ketetapan merangka gerak menangani Holistik termasuklah menjemput mendengar rungutan menguatkuasakan segala peruntukan menghalang mana-mana demokrasi perjumpaan umum membangkitkan bangsa agama menggugat perpaduan keharmonian kesejahteraan implikasi perpaduan iniKerajaan mengatakan bot lautan beroperasi mendatangkan total disuarakan pengusaha bot lautan menjual minyak diesel bersubsidi bot-bot tangkapan bot lautan dijual nelayan kedua-dua disebutkan mendatangkan kerugian subsidi diesel mahupun tangkapan lautan dijual menangani ketetapan merangka which proceedings are active in United Kingdom courts shall not be referred to in any motion debate or question see pp 441-443 though the House has further resolved to give Chair some discretion to allow reference to be made to matters awaiting or under jurisdiction in all civil courts in certain specified circumstances provided that there is no real and substantial danger of prejudice to the proceedings The rule it is called also applied to matters before coroner s court or Fatal Accident Inquiry If the subject-matter of the question is found to be or become of the questions has been given the Member is asked to withdraw it or the may direct it to be removed from the notice paper or refuse to allow it to be asked if it is on the Order Paper The rule does not apply to matters which are in courts of law outside Great Britain and Northern Island nor to matters which are the subject of administrative inquiry segala hormatnya jelas berasaskan alasan bertentangan praktis diamalkan dibincangkan Buku Erskine May s Treaties on The Law Privileges Proceeding s and Usage of Parliament 24th Edition dimukasurat disebut berikut By resolution of the House cases in which proceedings are active in United Kingdom courts shall not be referred to in any motion debate or question see pp 441-443 though the House has further resolved to give Chair some discretion to allow reference to be made to matters awaiting or under jurisdiction in all civil courts in certain specified circumstances provided that there is no real and substantial danger of prejudice to the proceedings The rule it is called also applied to matters before coroner s court or Fatal Accident Inquiry If the subject-matter of the question is found to be or become of the questions has been given the Member is asked to withdraw it or the may direct it to be removed from the notice paper or refuse to allow it to be asked if it is on the Order Paper The rule does not apply to matters which are in courts of law outside Great Britain and Northern Island nor to matters which are the subject of administrative inquiry segala hormatnya jelas berasaskan alasan bertentangan praktis diamalkan sedemikian dikaji Seterusnya kembali petikan buku Erskine May jelas sekiranya prosiding memutuskan dihalang menilaikan wujud real and substantial danger of prejudice prosiding segala hormatnya menimbang seterusnya berpendapat Ahli-ahli didengar berkenaannya menyakinkan diri rujukan penuh prosiding seterusnya menimbangkan kesan soalan-soalan ditanya prosiding hal memohon menjelaskan salinan menimbangkan mendalam diputuskan 231g question shall not be so drafted to be likely to prejudice case under trial or be asked to any matter which is Reference shall not be made to any matter which is in such way might in the opinion of chair prejudice the interests of parties thereto segala hormatnya menentusahkan parties prejudis timbul seakibat diajukan dilanda krisis wujudnya melibatkan topik perbincangan hangat dikaji alasan-alasan berikut menghalang terpakai kes-kes sivil in rem Keadilan Amerika penolakan seseorang dikecualikan menjawab alasan judis dibincangkan Buku Erskine May s Treaties on The Law Privileges Proceeding s and Usage of Parliament 24th Edition dimukasurat disebut berikut By resolution of the House cases in which proceedings are active in United Kingdom courts shall not be referred to in any motion debate or question see pp 441-443 though the House has further resolved to give Chair some discretion to allow reference to be made to matters awaiting or under jurisdiction in all civil courts in certain specified circumstances provided that there is no real and substantial danger of prejudice to the proceedings The rule it is called also applied to matters before coroner s court or Fatal Accident Inquiry If the subject-matter of the question is found to be or become of the questions has been given the Member is asked to withdraw it or the may direct it to be removed from the notice paper or refuse to allow it to be asked if it is on the Order Paper The rule does not apply to matters which are in courts of law outside Great Britain and Northern Island nor to matters which are the subject of administrative inquiry segala hormatnya jelas berasaskan alasan bertentangan praktis diamalkan sedemikian dikaji Seterusnya kembali petikan buku Erskine May jelas sekiranya prosiding memutuskan dihalang menilaikan wujud real and substantial danger of prejudice prosiding segala hormatnya menimbang seterusnya berpendapat Ahli-ahli didengar berkenaannya menyakinkan diri rujukan penuh prosiding seterusnya menimbangkan kesan soalan-soalan ditanya prosiding hal memohon menjelaskan salinan menimbangkan mendalam kertas-kertas prosiding DOJ tuntutan jawapan-jawapan kepadanya sekiranya menyakinkan diri fakta-fakta isu-isu berbangkit soalan-soalan dihalang seterusnya segala hormatnya memohon rujuk 231g jelas diputuskan 231g question shall not be so drafted to be likely to prejudice case under trial or be asked to any matter which is Reference shall not be made to any matter which is in such way might in the opinion of chair prejudice the interests of parties thereto segala hormatnya menentusahkan parties prejudis timbul seakibat diajukan dilanda krisis wujudnya melibatkan topik perbincangan hangat telahpun menyebabkan tegas disebut berikut By resolution of the House cases in which proceedings are active in United Kingdom courts shall not be referred to in any motion debate or question see pp 441-443 though the House has further resolved to give Chair some discretion to allow reference to be made to matters awaiting or under jurisdiction in all civil courts in certain specified circumstances provided that there is no real and substantial danger of prejudice to the proceedings The rule it is called also applied to matters before coroner s court or Fatal Accident Inquiry If the subject-matter of the question is found to be or become of the questions has been given the Member is asked to withdraw it or the may direct it to be removed from the notice paper or refuse to allow it to be asked if it is on the Order Paper The rule does not apply to matters which are in courts of law outside Great Britain and Northern Island nor to matters which are the subject of administrative inquiry segala hormatnya jelas berasaskan alasan bertentangan praktis diamalkan sedemikian dikaji Seterusnya kembali petikan buku Erskine May jelas sekiranya prosiding memutuskan dihalang menilaikan wujud real and substantial danger of prejudice prosiding segala hormatnya menimbang seterusnya berpendapat Ahli-ahli didengar berkenaannya menyakinkan diri rujukan penuh prosiding seterusnya menimbangkan kesan soalan- ditanya prosiding hal memohon menjelaskan salinan menimbangkan mendalam kertas-kertas prosiding DOJ tuntutan jawapan-jawapan kepadanya sekiranya menyakinkan diri fakta-fakta isu-isu berbangkit soalan-soalan dihalang seterusnya segala hormatnya memohon rujuk 231g jelas diputuskan 231g question shall not be so drafted to be likely to prejudice case under trial or be asked to any matter which is Reference shall not be made to any matter which is in such way might in the opinion of chair prejudice the interests of parties thereto segala hormatnya menentusahkan parties prejudis timbul seakibat diajukan disebut berikut By resolution of the House cases in which proceedings are active in United Kingdom courts shall not be referred to in any motion debate or question see pp 441-443 though the House has further resolved to give Chair some discretion to allow reference to be made to matters awaiting or under jurisdiction in all civil courts in certain specified circumstances provided that there is no real and substantial danger of prejudice to the proceedings The rule it is called also applied to matters before coroner s court or Fatal Accident Inquiry If the subject-matter of the question is found to be or become of the questions has been given the Member is asked to withdraw it or the may direct it to be removed from the notice paper or refuse to allow it to be asked if it is on the Order Paper The rule does not apply to matters which are in courts of law outside Great Britain and Northern Island nor to matters which are the subject of administrative inquiry segala hormatnya sivil in rem Keadilan Amerika penolakan seseorang dikecualikan menjawab alasan judis dibincangkan Buku Erskine May s Treaties on The Law Privileges Proceeding s and Usage of Parliament 24th Edition dimukasurat disebut berikut By resolution of the House cases in which proceedings are active in United Kingdom courts shall not be referred to in any motion debate or question see pp 441-443 though the House has further resolved to give Chair some discretion to allow reference to be made to matters awaiting or under jurisdiction in all civil courts in certain specified circumstances provided that there is no real and substantial danger of prejudice to the proceedings The rule it is called also applied to matters before coroner s court or Fatal Accident Inquiry If the subject-matter of the question is found to be or become of the questions has been given the Member is asked to withdraw it or the may direct it to be removed from the notice paper or refuse to allow it to be asked if it is on the Order Paper The rule does not apply to matters which are in courts of law outside Great Britain and Northern Island nor to matters which are the subject of administrative inquiry segala hormatnya jelas berasaskan alasan bertentangan praktis diamalkan sedemikian dikaji Seterusnya kembali petikan buku Erskine May jelas sekiranya prosiding memutuskan dihalang menilaikan wujud real and substantial danger of prejudice prosiding segala hormatnya menimbang seterusnya berpendapat Ahli-ahli didengar berkenaannya menyakinkan diri rujukan penuh prosiding seterusnya menimbangkan kesan soalan- ditanya prosiding hal memohon menjelaskan salinan menimbangkan mendalam kertas-kertas prosiding DOJ tuntutan jawapan-jawapan kepadanya sekiranya menyakinkan diri fakta-fakta isu-isu berbangkit soalan-soalan dihalang seterusnya segala hormatnya memohon rujuk 231g jelas diputuskan 231g question shall not be so drafted to be likely to prejudice case under trial or be asked to any matter which is Reference shall not be made to any matter which is in such way might in the opinion of chair prejudice the interests of parties thereto segala hormatnya menentusahkan parties prejudis timbul which proceedings are active in United Kingdom courts shall not be referred to in any motion debate or question see pp 441-443 though the House has further resolved to give Chair some discretion to allow reference to be made to matters awaiting or under jurisdiction in all civil courts in certain specified circumstances provided that there is no real and substantial danger of prejudice to the proceedings The rule it is called also applied to matters before coroner s court or Fatal Accident Inquiry If the subject-matter of the question is found to be or become of the questions has been given the Member is asked to withdraw it or the may direct it to be removed from the notice paper or refuse to allow it to be asked if it is on the Order Paper The rule does not apply to matters which are in courts of law outside Great Britain and Northern Island nor to matters which are the subject of administrative inquiry segala hormatnya jelas berasaskan alasan bertentangan praktis diamalkan sedemikian dikaji Seterusnya kembali petikan buku Erskine May jelas sekiranya prosiding memutuskan dihalang menilaikan wujud real and substantial danger of prejudice prosiding segala hormatnya undang-undang jenayah Syariah berhak menjatuhkan hukuman dibenarkan undang-undang syariah hal-hal kesalahan disenaraikan disebutkan diatas hukuman mati kesan pemanasan serius disebabkan peningktan laut sawah-sawah padi ditanam tanaman padi disebabkan sawah-sawah padi dicemari masin kesan fenomena petani terutama menanam padi sawah-sawah padi berkedudukan pesisir pantai kehilangan punca sekaligus kualiti hidup terjejas mitigasi memulihkan petani memperkenalkan tanaman komersial sesuai ditanam sawah dimasuki masin penanaman kelapa pandan sebagainya penyediaan pengorekan perparitan meninggikan dimaksudkan terlibat terlibat ditenggelami masin menangani ketetapan samping menangani pemanasan serius harus segera petani pesawah padi mengusahakan sawah-sawah padi terjejas fenomena memperkenalkan tanaman komersial purata hujan tahunan sering dengar banjir kilat menyebabkan kemusnahan harta benda ameniti sosial kerosakan sekitar lain-lain menjangkau jutaan nilainya banjir ditambah burukkan kolam paya ditimbus hartanah sebagainya menyebabkan sungai-sungai terusan menampung mengalir mendadak mitigasi kolam-kolam luas diwujudkan sesuatu menampung hujan lebat ianya mengalir sungai-sungai terusan gus kejadian banjir kilat takungan kolam-kolam dirawat disalirkan empangan bekalan digunakan terawat takungan kolam disalurkan industri-industri memerlukannya samping digunakan menyiram tanaman taman-taman menangani banjir kilat ketetapan mensyaratkan sesuatu zon dibangunkan kolam takungan disediakan graduan lulusan sekolah menengah berpeluang kebanyakan akhirnya berlegar kampung masing-masing berpendapatan peluang-peluang diusahakan kampung-kampung sekiranya berminat latihan bimbingan bantuan secukupnya mengutarakan desa kampung industri namun seumpamanya benar-benar kebanyakan bekalan mentah penghasilan herba tenusu lain-lain didapati kampung-kampung cottage industry kampung terlibat manfaat malah keseluruhannya manfaat aliran dijana menangani ketetapan merumus mekanisme efektif penglibatan kampung cottage industry manfaat 15-20 kampung sara hidup keluarga mendadak dirasakan hebat golongan berpendapatan solar membekalkan eletrik murah mesra penurunan hujan agak membekalkan bekalan mentah sekiranya ditadah disimpan meringankan sara hidup keluarga terutama golongan berpendapatan ketetapan PPRT dilengkapkan solar tangki tadahan pemilik menjawab alasan judis dibincangkan Buku Erskine May s Treaties on The Law Privileges Proceeding s and Usage of Parliament 24th Edition dimukasurat disebut berikut By resolution of the House cases in which proceedings are active in United Kingdom courts shall not be referred to in any motion debate or question see pp 441-443 though the House has further resolved to give Chair some discretion to allow reference to be made to matters awaiting or under jurisdiction in all civil courts in certain specified circumstances provided that there is no real and substantial danger of prejudice to the proceedings The rule it is called also applied to matters before coroner s court or Fatal Accident Inquiry If the subject-matter of the question is found to be or become of the questions has been given the Member is asked to withdraw it or the may direct it to be removed from the notice paper or refuse to allow it to be asked if it is on the Order Paper The rule does not apply to matters which are in courts of law outside Great Britain and Northern Island nor to matters which are the subject of administrative inquiry segala hormatnya jelas berasaskan alasan bertentangan praktis diamalkan sedemikian dikaji Seterusnya kembali petikan buku Erskine May jelas sekiranya prosiding memutuskan dihalang menilaikan wujud real and substantial danger of prejudice prosiding segala hormatnya menimbang seterusnya berpendapat Ahli-ahli didengar berkenaannya menyakinkan diri rujukan penuh prosiding seterusnya menimbangkan kesan soalan-soalan ditanya prosiding hal memohon menjelaskan salinan menimbangkan mendalam kertas-kertas prosiding DOJ tuntutan jawapan-jawapan kepadanya sekiranya menyakinkan diri fakta-fakta isu-isu berbangkit soalan-soalan dihalang seterusnya segala hormatnya memohon rujuk 231g jelas diputuskan 231g question shall not be so drafted to be likely to prejudice case under trial or be asked to any matter which is Reference shall not be made to any matter which is in such way might in the opinion of chair prejudice the interests of parties thereto segala hormatnya menentusahkan parties prejudis timbul seakibat diajukan dilanda krisis wujudnya melibatkan allow reference to be made to matters awaiting or under jurisdiction in all civil courts in certain specified circumstances provided that there is no real and substantial danger of prejudice to the proceedings The rule it is called also applied to matters before coroner s court or Fatal Accident Inquiry If the subject-matter of the question is found to be or become of the questions has been given the Member is asked to withdraw it or the may direct it to be removed from the notice paper or refuse to allow it to be asked if it is on the Order Paper The rule does not apply to matters which
